message:
the format text with clawed button is still not working correctly even though you made significant changes when I click on it it says formatting text with and then it just formats the text and changes a few things on it it doesn't give me the correct format as it's supposed to with the review task can you please fix this and test it thoroughly please I want you to test it in playwright and confirm it is working correctly as it doesn't seem to be it's getting frustrating because this is the eighth time we've tried to fix this issue and it was fixed before you need to follow the review task and Mark down file and present it in the Brett panel there is also a task for MD file already created in the cord folder which you can review and that's the format that I'd to it to be in it is a fairly simple task but you seem to be getting it wrong please fix it permanently and test it thoroughly to confirm that it is working correctly now

/orchestrate
